title: The Excursions of Mr. Brouček to the Moon and to the 15th Century
displaytitle: The Excursions of Mr. Brouček to the Moon and to the 15th Century

titles.normalized: The Excursions of Mr. Brouček to the Moon and to the 15th Century
titles.display: The Excursions of Mr. Brouček to the Moon and to the 15th Century

extract: The Excursions of Mr. Brouček to the Moon and to the 15th Century is the complete title of Leoš Janáček’s fifth opera, based on two Svatopluk Čech novels, Pravý výlet pana Broučka do Měsíce (1888) and Nový epochální výlet pana Broučka, tentokráte do XV. století (1889). The librettists for Part 1 were František Gellner, Viktor Dyk, František Sarafínský Procházka and others, while Part 2 was written by F. S. Procházka.
extract_html: The Excursions of Mr. Brouček to the Moon and to the 15th Century is the complete title of Leoš Janáček’s fifth opera, based on two Svatopluk Čech novels, Pravý výlet pana Broučka do Měsíce (1888) and Nový epochální výlet pana Broučka, tentokráte do XV. století (1889). The librettists for Part 1 were František Gellner, Viktor Dyk, František Sarafínský Procházka and others, while Part 2 was written by F. S. Procházka.
